DOC.brief_summary: A multicentre , prospective , randomize study compare bulbar urethroplasty excision primary anastomosis onlay graft procedure use buccal mucosa .

One technique excision stricture end-to-end anastomosis urethra . The technique onlay graft procedure buccal mucosa corpus spongiosum divide . The study design compare complication sexual penile function , power compare success rate two technique . The primary endpoint degree erectile dysfunction penile complication . The secondary endpoint restricturing leading reoperation , complication .
